properties.name: North Mile Oak 3
properties.comments/reasons: Difficult land for any growing, steep slope and chalky soil.

properties.name: Land at Hangleton Bottom
properties.comments/reasons: Site is allocated for waste in adopted Waste Local Plan.

properties.name: North Mile Oak 4
properties.comments/reasons: Difficult land for any growing, steep slope and chalky soil.

properties.name: Land by Thornbush Cr, incl. Foredown Allotments
properties.comments/reasons: Statutory Allotments (22 plots) in use with waiting list and open space, designated countryside in adopted Local Plan, designated Site of Nature Conservation Importance.

properties.name: Benfield Valley
properties.comments/reasons: Open Space, designated as countryside, designated as Site of Nature Conservation Importance. Adopted Local Plan Policy NC9 identifies Benfield Valley as an important green wedge into the urban area much used by the general public for outdoor recreation and contains significant wildlife habitats so should remain free from further built development.

properties.name: New Barn Farm
properties.comments/reasons: Part of New Barn Farm, BHCC farmed estate

properties.name: West Hove Golf Courses
properties.comments/reasons: West Hove Golf Course

properties.name: Three Cornered Copse (north)
properties.comments/reasons: Adjacent to National Park Boundary and forms a wildlife corridor from the Downs to Hove Park. Popular site for quiet recreation. Designated countryside,  Site of Nature Conservation Interest, Woodland Drive Conservation Area, part Archaeologically Sensitive Area. Access difficult- heavily used junction. Pending designation for LNR. Managed by Friends of Three Cornered Copse.

properties.name: Ovingdean 1
properties.comments/reasons: Private land let for horse grazing. Prominent site, but isolated from wider downland; adjacent to residential area. Designated as countryside in the adopted Local Plan, Wanderdown Road Open Space SNCI, archeologically sensitive area to north of site.

properties.name: West saltdean
properties.comments/reasons: Private land let for horse grazing. Designated as countryside in the adopted Local Plan, Wanderdown Road Open Space SNCI, archeologically sensitive area to north of site.

properties.name: East saltdean 1
properties.comments/reasons: Secure potable water site unsuitable for any food production.

properties.name: Devil's dyke road
properties.comments/reasons: Amenity land which is windy and exposed, already part of the Council's conservation grazing scheme.

properties.name: Ovingdean
properties.comments/reasons: Ovingdean Grange Farm

properties.name: Ovingdean north
properties.comments/reasons: Protected area (Red Star Thitsle), horse grazing, designated as countryside in the adopted Local Plan.

properties.name: Coombe farm land
properties.comments/reasons: Private farm land, part of site within Coombe Farm SNCI, supports chalk grassland under grazing management. Current agricultural use and unlikely to be released.

properties.name: Balsdean farm
properties.comments/reasons: Private farm land

properties.name: Lower Roedale Allotments
properties.comments/reasons: Statutory allotments, well-used (122 plots) with waiting list. Designated as countryside in adopted Local Plan, proposed Local Nature Reserve, playing fields and grounds associated with Cedar Close school. Possible for an orchard or short lease horticulture.

properties.name: Land at the North east of Coldean lane
properties.comments/reasons: Vacant farmland at coldean, no fencing, no water, steep site, problems with access, needs investment. Archaeologically Sensitive Area.

properties.name: Allotments to the east of The Green - Rottingdean Sheep Walk
properties.comments/reasons: Well-used allotments with waiting list (Windmill Hill Allotments), designated as countryside in the adopted Local Plan, sloping site part of site within Beacon Hill Local Nature Reserve, part within Rottingdean Conservation Area.

properties.name: Hodshrove woods
properties.comments/reasons: Woodland.

properties.name: Brighton Borough Cemetery & Crematorium
properties.comments/reasons: Countryside, Site of Nature Conservation Interest, Historic park and garden, Greenway.

properties.name: Site at Mile Oak Road Portslade 1
properties.comments/reasons: Prominent location and steeply sloping part of Mile Oak Hill. Designated countryside in adopted Local Plan

properties.name: Site at Mile Oak Road Portslade 2
properties.comments/reasons: Prominent location and steeply sloping part of Mile Oak Hill. Designated countryside in adopted Local Plan.

properties.name: Mile Oak Allotments Overdown Rise
properties.comments/reasons: Statutory Allotments - well used (61 plots) with waiting list, designated countryside in the adopted Local Plan, part of site designated as Site of Nature Conservation Importance.

properties.name: Land Braeside Avenue
properties.comments/reasons: Local Wildlife Site.

properties.name: Ladies Mile
properties.comments/reasons:
Designated as countryside in adopted Local Plan, Ladies Mile Local Nature Reserve, Archaeologically Sensitive Area - part of a Romano-British landscape.
Ridge of unimproved grassland plateau top downland, has a strong visual connectivity with the wider Downs. Playing field on southern end of site associated with Patcham High School. Part of site is currently underused and contains long grass. Interest in use for all weather football pitch.

properties.name: Brighton University Playing Fields
properties.comments/reasons: Designated outdoor space/sports fields

properties.name: Roedale Valley Allotments
properties.comments/reasons: Roedale Valley statutory allotments (216 plots) well used. Designated countryside in adopted Local Plan. Site lies adjacent to South Downs National Park. Part of proposed Local Nature Reserve.

properties.name: Hollingbury Park Recreation Ground
properties.comments/reasons: Current use of the site is mixed - school pitches, sports pavilion and court, children's play area, open space, wooded area. Designated countryside in adopted Local Plan. Site lies adjacent to South Downs National Park. Part of proposed Local Nature Reserve. Recreation ground serving a large residential population.

properties.name: Tenantry Down Road Allotments
properties.comments/reasons: Tenantry Down Road Allotments. Countryside, Site of Nature Conservation Interest, Historic park and garden, Greenway.

properties.name: Race Hill Farm Allotments
properties.comments/reasons: Race Hill Farm Allotments (Wilson Avenue) well -used (75 plots) with waiting list.

properties.name: Whitehawk Allotments
properties.comments/reasons: Allotments. Designated as countryside in the adopted Local Plan, Local Nature Reserve.

properties.name: Brighton Race Course Freshfield Road
properties.comments/reasons: Mixed uses - Brighton Race Course (major sporting venue), rough grassland/open space, recreation grounds. Designated as countryside in the adopted Local Plan, Local Nature Reserve, playground - well used recreation area. Designated for Higher Level Stewardship funding.

properties.name: Sheepcote Valley
properties.comments/reasons: Designated as countryside in the adopted Local Plan, used as informal open space, Site of Nature Conservation Importance, part of area is former landfill site; contamination issues for food growing.

properties.name: East Brighton Park and Sports Ground
properties.comments/reasons: Designated as countryside in adopted Local Plan, formal park area + sports field.

properties.name: Roedean Miniature Golf Course
properties.comments/reasons: Prominent site on downland cliffs, setting of the city. Designated as open countryside in adopted Local Plan, archeologically sensitive area, used as outdoor recreational facility. Designated for Higher Level Stewardship funding.

properties.name: Land west of Saltdean Vale
properties.comments/reasons: Mixed uses: agricultural use, football pitches (Saltdean United Football Club), and Pickers Hill Farm Cottage. Exposed site.

properties.name: Race Hill Orchard
properties.comments/reasons: Race Hill Orchard planted in 2013.

properties.name: Land next to Tenantry Down Allotments
properties.comments/reasons: Rough grassland, open space, designated as countryside in the adopted, local Plan, Local Nature Reserve, lower end archaeological sensitive area.

properties.name: Lawn Memorial Cemetery
properties.comments/reasons:
Prominent site with strategic views over downs adjacent to South Downs National Park.
Designated as countryside in the adopted Local Plan. Mixed open space uses: Lawns Memorial Park burial ground and open fields to the south of Sussex Nuffield Hospital and to the rear of Downs View Schools (one field possibly used by school).

properties.name: Oakdene - Upper Paddocks
properties.comments/reasons: Exposed site and adjacent to the South Downs National Park, designated Site of Nature Conservation Importance, Countryside designation in adopted Local Plan.

properties.name: Land West of Mile Oak Road
properties.comments/reasons: Designated Site of Nature Conservation Importance, countryside designation in adopted Local Plan, land subject to a grazing tenancy, nitrate vulnerable zone.

properties.name: Oakdene - Former School Site
properties.comments/reasons: Prominent location and adjacent to the South Downs National Park. Site designated as countryside in the adopted Local Plan. Important green edge to the city and part of the setting of Southwick Hill.
